name: Robu Reta!!!
description:
Your waifu came to life! And she is in your classroom too!

But now the otakus are trying to take her away from you, keep them at bay!

I do not own any song. All the rights go to their respective authors.

Songs used:

  • "New Moe Groove" By Moe Shop
  • "Night Of Fire" By Niko
  • "Running In The 90s" By Billy More
  • "Deja Vu" By Dave Rodgers
  • "Sad Romance" By Ji Pyeongkeyo
